title: The Wolf Among Us Episode 2-CODEX
description:
:::::::: CODEX PRESENTS ::::::::


:::: The Wolf Among Us Episode 2-CODEX ::::


::Information::


The Wolf Among Us: Episode 2
Release Date: 01/2014 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Adventure
From the makers of the 2012 Game of the Year: The Walking
Dead, comes a gritty, violent and mature thriller based on
the award-winning Fables comic books (DC Comics/Vertigo)
As Bigby Wolf - THE big bad wolf - you will discover that
a brutal, bloody murder is just a taste of things to come
in a game series where your every decision can have enormous
consequences

#1 - Burn / Mount
#2 - Load image file in your emulator or burn
#3 - Install Game
#4 - Copy cracked content from CODEX folder to installdir
#5 - Play

CODEX is currently looking for

nothing but competition

are you ready

LNKCPS 01/2014


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 
Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz or equivalent 
Memory: 3 GB RAM 
Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/ 512 MB RAM 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space 
Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device 
Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel integrated graphics


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT Goes to CODEX for Ripping and geroinnn for Distribution.
